description: CustomResourceDefinitionVersion describes a version for CRD.

additionalPrinterColumns.description: AdditionalPrinterColumns are additional columns shown e.g. in kubectl next to the name. Defaults to a created-at column.

name.description: Name is the version name, e.g. “v1”, “v2beta1”, etc.

schema.description: Schema describes the schema for CustomResource used in validation, pruning, and defaulting.

served.description: Served is a flag enabling/disabling this version from being served via REST APIs

storage.description: Storage flags the version as storage version. There must be exactly one flagged as storage version.

subresources.description: Subresources describes the subresources for CustomResource
